npcMessage.comment: Are you interested in changing professions?  If so, I might be able to help you.  Recent advances in Mon-Cal neuro-nanite technologies have enabled us to transmute the knowledge you possess of your current profession to that of a different profession.

playerMessage.comment: Sounds good, but how much is it going to cost me?
